Items.Script: The robot correctly answered the elder's question and moved towards the shore, towards the mill.
He saw a sad miller sitting on a bench. After talking to a villager, the robot found out that the mill had several gears out of order and was therefore not working.
Our hero decided to help the miller and began to inspect a nearby box with various trash and scrap metal. Perhaps an attentive robot will be able to find something suitable to replace it.
